title: Ignition failure - boiler fails to ignite
summary: The boiler has attempted to ignite but has failed three times in succession. This is a common fault that prevents the boiler from heating.
causes: Gas supply issue or gas valve closed
safetyNotice: If you smell gas, turn off the gas supply immediately and call a Gas Safe registered engineer.

title: Low water pressure
summary: The system water pressure has dropped below the minimum required level (typically below 0.5 bar). The boiler will not operate until pressure is restored.
causes: Recently bled radiators without topping up

title: Pump pressure fault
summary: The pump is not detecting adequate pressure difference. This may indicate a pump issue or blockage in the system.

title: Flame sensing failure
summary: The boiler has ignited but the flame is not being detected by the flame sensor. This causes the boiler to shut down as a safety precaution.
safetyNotice: This is a safety-critical fault. Do not attempt to bypass. Contact a qualified engineer.

title: Overheat thermostat operated
summary: The overheat thermostat has activated, indicating the boiler temperature exceeded safe limits. This is a safety shutdown.
safetyNotice: Allow the boiler to cool completely before attempting reset. If fault persists, call an engineer.

title: Internal control fault
summary: The boiler's internal control system has detected an error. This may require PCB diagnostics.

title: Gas valve fault
summary: The gas valve is not responding correctly to control signals. The boiler cannot safely operate.
safetyNotice: Do not attempt to force the gas valve open. Contact a Gas Safe registered engineer.

title: Low system pressure
summary: The system pressure is too low for safe operation. Similar to other low pressure faults.

title: Fan fault
summary: The fan is not operating correctly or not reaching required speed. The boiler will not ignite without proper fan operation.

title: Temperature limiter triggered
summary: The safety temperature limiter has been triggered, shutting down the boiler to prevent overheating damage.
safetyNotice: Let the boiler cool down completely before resetting. Check system pressure before restart.

title: Internal control fault
summary: An internal control or sensor error has been detected. Requires diagnostic testing.

title: Insufficient water circulation
summary: The system is not circulating water properly. This can lead to overheating and system damage.

title: Ignition failure
summary: The boiler has failed to ignite after multiple attempts. No heating or hot water available.
safetyNotice: Check gas supply is on. If problem persists, contact a qualified engineer.

title: Low water pressure
summary: System pressure has dropped below operational minimum. Boiler will not fire until pressure is restored.

title: Overheat protection activated
summary: The boiler has overheated and shut down for safety. This indicates a circulation or flow problem.
safetyNotice: Allow complete cooling before reset. Do not repeatedly reset if fault returns.

title: Flame loss during operation
summary: The boiler ignited successfully but the flame was lost during operation. Safety lockout engaged.
safetyNotice: If fault occurs repeatedly, do not keep resetting. Call a Gas Safe engineer.

title: Ignition lockout
summary: The boiler has entered safety lockout after failed ignition attempts. Manual reset required.
causes: No gas supply or valve closed

title: Ignition failure
summary: The boiler cannot establish ignition. System locked out for safety.
safetyNotice: Verify gas supply before calling for service.

title: Flame detection fault
summary: Flame is present but not being detected by the sensor, or false flame signal detected.

title: Low water pressure
summary: System water pressure is below minimum operating level.

title: Lack of flame or ionization fault
summary: The boiler cannot detect a flame signal. This is a safety lockout condition.
causes: No gas or low gas pressure
safetyNotice: Ensure gas supply is adequate before service call.

title: Overheat safety thermostat
summary: The safety overheat thermostat has tripped due to excessive boiler temperature.
safetyNotice: Allow cooling and check system circulation before reset.

title: Flue thermostat safety lockout
summary: The flue safety thermostat has activated, indicating a flue problem or overheating condition.
safetyNotice: Do not operate boiler if flue is blocked. Risk of carbon monoxide.

title: Fan speed monitoring fault
summary: The fan speed sensor detects incorrect fan operation. Boiler will not ignite without proper fan speed.

title: Flame signal fault
summary: Unexpected flame signal or no flame signal when expected. Safety shutdown engaged.
safetyNotice: If you smell gas when boiler is off, evacuate and call emergency gas service.

title: Flame loss during operation
summary: The flame was lost while the boiler was running. Multiple causes possible.

title: Gas valve fault
summary: The gas valve control circuit has detected a fault. The boiler cannot operate safely.
safetyNotice: Gas valve faults require immediate professional attention.

title: Fan speed fault
summary: The fan is not reaching the required speed for safe operation.

title: Overheat shutdown
summary: The boiler has shut down due to excessive temperature in the heat exchanger.
safetyNotice: Check pump operation and system pressure before reset.

title: Flame simulation
summary: A flame signal is detected when no gas should be present. This is a serious safety fault.
safetyNotice: DANGER: This may indicate a gas leak. Turn off gas supply and call emergency services if gas smell present.

title: Pump stuck or blocked
summary: The circulation pump is not operating correctly. Water cannot circulate through the system.

title: Fan failure
summary: The combustion fan has failed or is not operating within parameters.

title: False flame detected
summary: The control system detects a flame when the gas valve is closed. Critical safety fault.
safetyNotice: Do not operate boiler. If gas smell present, evacuate and call gas emergency.

title: High temperature shutdown
summary: The boiler has exceeded safe operating temperature and shut down.
safetyNotice: Allow complete cooling. Check system pressure and pump operation.

title: High temperature safety limit
summary: The high limit thermostat has activated due to dangerous temperature levels.
safetyNotice: Let boiler cool completely. Check for underlying circulation problems.

title: Supply water temperature too low
summary: The flow temperature sensor detects water temperature below expected levels.

title: Gas valve or gas valve relay fault
summary: The control board cannot properly control the gas valve circuit.

title: Fan failure or PCB fault
summary: The fan is not operating or the PCB cannot detect fan operation.

title: Boiler control fault
summary: Internal control system error. May require PCB replacement or software reset.

title: Flame sensor fault
summary: The flame sensing circuit is not working correctly. Boiler cannot verify safe combustion.

title: DHW sensor fault
summary: The domestic hot water temperature sensor is reporting an error or out-of-range reading.

title: PCB overheating
summary: The printed circuit board temperature is too high. Boiler shuts down to prevent damage.

title: Heating flow temperature sensor fault
summary: The heating flow thermistor is reporting incorrect or no data.

title: Air pressure switch fault
summary: The air pressure switch is not detecting proper flue draft or fan operation.

title: No demand signal
summary: The boiler is not receiving a heating or hot water demand signal from the controls.

title: Return temperature sensor fault
summary: The return water temperature sensor is faulty or reading out of range.

title: Flow temperature rise too slow
summary: The water temperature is not rising at the expected rate. Possible circulation issue.

title: NTC thermistor fault
summary: One of the temperature sensors (NTC thermistors) is reporting a fault condition.

title: Gas valve circuit fault
summary: The gas valve control circuit has detected an abnormality. Safety lockout activated.
safetyNotice: Do not bypass gas valve safety circuits. Professional repair required.

title: Electrical safety issue
summary: The boiler has detected an electrical safety fault and shut down to prevent hazard.
safetyNotice: Isolate electrical supply. Professional inspection required before restart.
